name: Hypnosis Prison
description:
◆Story

Jack, a common criminal, finds himself imprisoned in the freezing northern Prison City. He was assigned to smuggle contraband by Warden Snow. Despite being treated as a disposable tool, Jack has a secret up his sleeve: he possesses the ability to hypnotize people. However, he needs to train and refine this skill before he can use it effectively. With determination, Jack declares, "Humph! Arrogant warden, I will make you kneel before me and beg like a dog! Fear the power of hypnosis."

◆Gameplay

Use the money received from Warden Snow for smuggling and attempt to skim some for yourself by completing tasks as cost-effectively as possible. As you endure the harsh conditions of the prison, focus on honing and mastering your hypnosis to one day use it on Warden Snow and ultimately escape.

◆Game Features

1. Engaging scenes that will surely satisfy your appetite.

2. Fun and entertaining adult dating sim.
3. A unique story set in the same universe as Golden Axe Idol.
4. Naughty plot involving hypnosis.
5. A massive script comprising over 100,000 words.
